Uses of Class
com.googlecode.gchart.client.GChart.LegendLocation

Uses of GChart.LegendLocation in com.googlecode.gchart.client
 

Fields in com.googlecode.gchart.client declared as GChart.LegendLocation
static GChart.LegendLocation GChart.LegendLocation.INSIDE_BOTTOM
          Places the legend inside the plot area, centered along the bottom edge.
static GChart.LegendLocation GChart.LegendLocation.INSIDE_BOTTOMLEFT
          Places the legend in the lower left inside corner of the plot area.
static GChart.LegendLocation GChart.LegendLocation.INSIDE_BOTTOMRIGHT
          Places the legend in the lower right inside corner of the plot area.
static GChart.LegendLocation GChart.LegendLocation.INSIDE_LEFT
          Places the legend inside the plot area, centered along the left edge.
static GChart.LegendLocation GChart.LegendLocation.INSIDE_RIGHT
          Places the legend inside the plot area, centered along the right edge.
static GChart.LegendLocation GChart.LegendLocation.INSIDE_TOP
          Places the legend inside the plot area, centered along the top edge.
static GChart.LegendLocation GChart.LegendLocation.INSIDE_TOPLEFT
          Places the legend in the upper left inside corner of the plot area.
static GChart.LegendLocation GChart.LegendLocation.INSIDE_TOPRIGHT
          Places the legend in the upper right inside corner of the plot area.
static GChart.LegendLocation GChart.LegendLocation.OUTSIDE_LEFT
          Places the legend so that it is vertically centered on the left edge of the chart's plot area, and to the left of the y axis label.
static GChart.LegendLocation GChart.LegendLocation.OUTSIDE_RIGHT
          Places the legend so that it is vertically centered on the right edge of the chart's plot area, and to the right of the y2 axis label.
 

Methods in com.googlecode.gchart.client with parameters of type GChart.LegendLocation
 void GChart.setLegendLocation(GChart.LegendLocation legendLocation)
          Specifies the position of the legend on the chart.
